#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 800MHz or better
RAM: 256MB
DirectX Version: 8.1 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista and XP
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Blasterball 2 Revolution_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Want a break from the everyday? Try Blasterball 2! Break your way though mesmerizing patterns of bricks, collecting items along the way - some helpful, some not. With tons of different puzzles and bosses, varying backgrounds, great music, and 200 levels of play, Blasterball 2: Revolution is bursting at the seams with fun. Play through the entire game to find the secret "backwards world" that will turn your game upside down with 100 more levels!

#################################################
